CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( OR( VALUE(LEFT( TEXT( Mardi_Fermeture__c ) , 2)) >= 19, VALUE(LEFT( TEXT( Mardi_Fermeture__c ) , 2)) = 00),
OR( VALUE(LEFT( TEXT(Mercredi_Fermeture__c ) , 2)) >= 19, VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Mercredi_Fermeture__c ), 2))=00),
OR( VALUE(LEFT( TEXT(Jeudi_Fermeture__c) , 2)) >= 19, VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Jeudi_Fermeture__c), 2))=00),
OR( VALUE(LEFT( TEXT(Vendredi_Fermeture__c) , 2)) >= 19, VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Vendredi_Fermeture__c), 2))=00),
OR( VALUE(LEFT( TEXT(Samedi_Fermeture__c) , 2)) >= 19, VALUE(LEFT(TEXT(Samedi_Fermeture__c), 2))=00)),
IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red"))
CustomField.label: Ouvert jusqu'Ã 19h
